post.author: MyungDae Kim
post.content:
i installed DVD drive with PowerDvd software on my PC. i feel it is excellent to do English Practice.
I can enjoy a lot of movies that i borrowed from library, and can check dialogue. if i can not hear dialogues, Repeat function can be used unlimitedly.
The DVD drive is LG product and price was 59 dollars and PowerDVD was 8 dollars.
if you are interested in it, please check ths shop website.
http://www.jnetronic.com/page_1.htm (Chinese shop in Markahm near Woodbine and Steels)
i saw the DVD price was downed to 55 dollars in another shop. you can check it in free computer magazine.(i can not rememver the shop.)
* the LG DVD with price 59 dollars can not be refunded because of OEM product. * please check details before buying. * i am not related to LG and just struggling to learn English.
post.title: DVD drive on your PC
